div.p: This value set indicates the allowed vital sign result types. The concept Vitals Signs Panel (8716-3) is a grouping structure for a set of vital signs and includes related links (with type=has-member) to the Observations in this set (e.g. respiratory rate, heart rate, BP). The Blood pressure systolic and diastolic (55284-4) is used to group the component observations Systolic blood pressure (8480-6) and Diastolic blood pressure (8462-4).
